divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my house when I decided to go until the yard, I looked at for the sky and I sighted a strange object, at the first moment I found that it was an airplane, but looked at and vi intently that he could not be because the object if put into motion very slowly, was not a helicopter, if the press was a meteor would speak, but this did not happen. The object age of golden color, had an average size in the front and a round format, in the way and behind had a tail. I was in the yard to see what it went to happen, the object was putting into motion and lost each time but clearness until it disappeared. Other people also they capsize. I am convinced that object was not a way of conventional transport, was very strange.
Summary: An object only, in the form of missel, color gold.Walked very slowly and the sky was becoming increasingly less clear and disappeared.
